content: fill your project bag with christmas magic & holiday sparkle so soft and plush…a hat even ol saint nick would be proud to wear you ll love how easy this is to knit using super bulky yarn this will give you a quick project you can knit in less than a day make one for each member of your family for a festive & fun christmas accessory this santa hat knitting pattern includes 1 detailed photo instructions for pom pom…including printable template 2 complete supply list & abbreviations terms for necessary stitches 3 instructions to knit approximate sizes 0-3months 13 -14 head circumference 3-6 months 15 -17 head circumference 6-12 months -18 20 head circumference 12-24 months 18 5 -19 head circumference 24-48 months 20 -21 head circumference 5-10 years 21 -22 head circumference adult 21 -23 head circumference santa hat supplies needed -super bulky yarn #6 weight in colors a & b see yardage below -for ivory brim & pom pom 25-55 yards/23-50 meters a- wool ease thick & quick shown in fisherman -for red santa hat body 25-55 yards/23-50 meters b- wool ease thick & quick shown in cranberry -us13 9 0mm 16 41cm circular knitting needles or size needed to obtain gauge -us13 9 0mm dpn for decreasing row or circular needles using magic loop method or size to obtain gauge -2 cardboard pom pom makers see instructions on how to make your own in the pattern -row counter stitch marker tapestry needle scissors get tutorials patterns & more here creatiknit com 1 c creatiknit pattern is the sole and express property of creatiknit this original pattern is for personal use only and it or products made from this pattern may not be used for resale may not be duplicated or reproduced without express permission from creatiknit@gmail com 1 creatiknit com
